name: TheAtlantic
text: "The backlash against a successful government program is why the U.S. can’t have nice things." @GrahamDavidA looks at criticism of the Paycheck Protection Program: https://t.co/aOoeS6VXuW

name: TheAtlantic
text: Calls for police reform continue. What’s the best way forward for American policing? Four writers share their thoughts in the latest Atlantic Daily: https://t.co/EKNSWOMPJG

name: TheAtlantic
text: Mike Pence is forever tied to the government’s botched pandemic response. And that’s something he’ll need to defend and explain if he ever runs for the higher office he’s long prized, @PeterAtlantic reports: https://t.co/sGRSlL6OJ4

name: TheAtlantic
text: If you use an Android device, what would you want from an Atlantic app? Please take our five-minute survey: https://t.co/BdfHjU6GCC

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @prashantrao: Alexander Vindman is retiring from the US military, having determined his future "will forever be limited" due to political retaliation.

The single most affecting piece I read on all of this came from @mikejason73 in @TheAtlantic: https://t.co/JaVKKYfl5W

name: TheAtlantic
text: As the fall approaches, many colleges are grappling with how to conduct classes: in person or online? Join @AtlanticLIVE, @AdamHSays, and @RonBrownstein for a live conversation on the road map to reopening higher education. https://t.co/x6DJVjiDdr
